metadata.title: AKS ClusterRole or ClusterRoleBinding Creation
metadata.description: Detects creation of ClusterRole or ClusterRoleBinding which may indicate privilege escalation.

properties.description: Detects when cluster-wide RBAC roles or bindings are created, which could indicate privilege escalation attempts.
properties.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| extend log = parse_json(log_s)
| extend verb = tostring(log.verb)
| extend objectRef = log.objectRef
| extend requestObject = log.requestObject
| extend user = log.user
| extend responseStatus = log.responseStatus
| where objectRef.resource in ("clusterroles", "clusterrolebindings")
| where verb == "create"
| where responseStatus.code in (200, 201)
| extend
    ResourceName = tostring(objectRef.name),
    ResourceType = tostring(objectRef.resource),
    Username = tostring(user.username),
    UserGroups = tostring(user.groups),
    ClusterName = Resource
| extend
    Rules = tostring(requestObject.rules),
    RoleRef = tostring(requestObject.roleRef),
    Subjects = tostring(requestObject.subjects)
| where not(Username startswith "system:")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    ResourceType,
    ResourceName,
    Username,
    UserGroups,
    Rules,
    RoleRef,
    Subjects
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, ResourceType, ResourceName, Username, Rules, RoleRef, Subjects

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: User '{{Username}}' created {{ResourceType}} '{{ResourceName}}' in cluster '{{ClusterName}}'. This may indicate privilege escalation.
